content: look

You are standing in a small cottage.
Exits:
Out to Garden Path

You see:
 * a fishing pole

As your gaze sweeps across the room, you find yourself in a quaint, dimly lit
cottage. The air is thick with the scent of old wood and dust, a testament to
the years of neglect this place has endured. The only source of light is a
flickering oil lamp, casting long, dancing shadows that seem to writhe and twist
on the worn-out wooden floorboards.

To your left, a rickety wooden table stands, its surface scarred by countless
knife cuts and burns. On it, a fishing pole lies abandoned, its line tangled and
hook rusty. It's a weapon of patience and precision, much like the life you once
knew.

To your right, a small, grimy window offers a view of the outside world. A
garden path, overgrown with weeds and wildflowers, snakes its way into the
darkness beyond. It's a path of uncertainty and danger, a path that promises
violence and bloodshed.

Your inventory is light. A single, well-worn handgun, a handful of bullets, and
a knife with a blade that's seen better days. It's not much, but in your hands,
they're as deadly as any arsenal.

You know this world. It's a world where the weak are preyed upon by the

take pole, go out, go south, catch fish with pole, go north, pick rose, smell rose, go north, go up, get branch, go down, go east, give the troll the fish, go east, hit guard with branch, get key, go east, get candle, go west, go down, light lamp, go down, light candle, read runes, get crown, go up, go up, go up, unlock door, go up, give rose to the princess, propose to the princess, wear crown, down, down, east, east, sit on throne
take pole
The player got the pole.

With a swift, practiced motion, you snatch up the fishing pole. The wood is worn
smooth from years of use, the line frayed and fragile. But in your hands, it
feels like an extension of your own body, a tool to be wielded with deadly
precision.
go out

You are standing on a lush garden path. There is a cottage here.
Exits:
In to Cottage
South to Fishing Pond
North to Winding Path

You see:
 * a rosebush
	pick rose

Stepping out of the cottage, you find yourself on a garden path. The air is cool
and crisp, filled with the scent of damp earth and blooming flowers. The path is
lined with overgrown rosebushes, their thorns gleaming menacingly in the
moonlight. The path stretches out before you, leading south towards a fishing
pond and north towards a winding path.
go south

You are at the edge of a small fishing pond.
Exits:
North to Garden Path

You see:
 * a small fishing pond
	catch fish
	catch fish with pole

You tread lightly down the path, the gravel crunching under your boots. The
garden gives way to a small fishing pond, its surface as smooth as glass under
the moonlight. The air here is heavy with the scent of water and fish, a
tranquil scene that belies the violence that lurks beneath the surface. The path
leads back north, towards the garden path.
catch fish with pole
The player dips their hook into the pond and catches a fish

With a fluid motion, you cast the line into the pond. The hook sinks beneath the
surface, disappearing into the dark depths. You wait, your senses heightened,
every muscle in your body coiled like a spring. Then, with a sudden jerk, the
line goes taut. With a swift, practiced motion, you reel in your catch. A
silver-scaled fish, its body writhing and twisting in a futile attempt to
escape.
But it's too late. The fish is yours.
go north

You are standing on a lush garden path. There is a cottage here.
Exits:
In to Cottage
South to Fishing Pond
North to Winding Path

You see:
 * a rosebush
	pick rose

Leaving the tranquility of the pond behind, you make your way back up the path.
The scent of roses fills the air as you find yourself back on the garden path,
the cottage looming ominously in the background. The path stretches out before
you, leading south back towards the pond and north towards a winding path. The
rosebush stands sentinel, its thorns glinting in the moonlight.
pick rose
The player picked the lone rose from the rosebush

With a swift, practiced motion, you reach out and pluck a single rose from the
bush. The thorns prick at your skin, drawing a bead of blood that quickly
wells up and drips down your hand. But you pay it no mind. The rose is
beautiful, its petals a deep, velvety red and its scent sweet and intoxicating.
It's a symbol of love and passion, a symbol of the life you once knew.
smell rose
The player smells the rose. It smells elegantly refined.

You bring the rose to your nose, inhaling deeply. The scent is sweet and
intoxicating, a heady mix of honey and summer nights. It's a scent that brings
back memories, memories of a time when life was simpler, when love was just a
word and not a weapon. But those days are long gone. Now, the rose is just a
rose, its scent a reminder of what once was and what can never be again.
The player is happy.

You are standing on a winding path. There is a tall tree here.
Exits:
South to Garden Path
Up to Tree Branch
North to Troll Bridge

You see:
 * a tall tree
        get branch
        go up
go north

You are walking along a winding path. There is a tall tree here.
Exits:
South to Garden Path
Up to Top of the Tall Tree
East to Drawbridge

You tread lightly up the winding path, the gravel crunching under your boots.
The path is lined with towering trees, their branches reaching out like skeletal
hands in the moonlight. The path stretches out before you, leading south back
towards the garden path, up into the branches of a tall tree, and north towards
a troll bridge. The tree stands sentinel, its branches swaying gently in the
breeze.
go up

You are the top of the tall tree.
Exits:
Down to Winding Path
Jump to The Afterlife

You see:
 * a stout, dead branch

With a swift, practiced motion, you scale the tree. The bark is rough against
your hands, the branches sturdy under your weight. You climb higher and higher,
until you find yourself at the top of the tree. The view from here is
breathtaking, the moonlight casting long, dancing shadows on the ground below.
A stout, dead branch catches your eye. It's a weapon, a tool to be wielded with
deadly precision. The only way down is the way you came, back down the winding
path.
get branch
The player got the branch.

With a swift, practiced motion, you reach out and snap off the dead branch. The
wood is hard and sturdy, a perfect weapon in the right hands. And your hands are
the right hands. The branch feels like an extension of your own body, a tool to
be wielded with deadly precision. With the branch in your possession, you're
ready to face whatever comes your way.
go down

You are walking along a winding path. There is a tall tree here.
Exits:
South to Garden Path
Up to Top of the Tall Tree
East to Drawbridge

With the branch in hand, you make your way back down the tree. The descent is
quick and easy, your movements fluid and sure. You land lightly on the winding
path, the gravel crunching under your boots. The path stretches out before you,
leading south back towards the garden path, up into the branches of the tall
tree, and east towards a drawbridge. The tree stands sentinel, its branches
swaying gently in the breeze.
go east

You are standing on one side of a drawbridge leading to ACTION CASTLE.
Exits:
West to Winding Path
East to Courtyard


Characters:
 * A mean troll

You tread lightly down the path, the gravel crunching under your boots. The path
gives way to a drawbridge, its wooden planks weathered and worn. The drawbridge
leads east, towards a courtyard and the looming silhouette of ACTION CASTLE. To
the west, the path winds its way back towards the tall tree.

Standing guard at the drawbridge is a mean troll. Its skin is a sickly green,
its eyes a piercing yellow. It snarls at your approach, its teeth sharp and
yellowed. But you're not afraid. You've faced worse than this.
give the troll the fish
The player gave the fish to Troll

With a swift, practiced motion, you reach into your inventory and pull out the
fish. The troll's eyes widen at the sight of it, its snarl turning into a
grin. You toss the fish to the troll, who catches it with a surprising amount of
grace. It devours the fish in a few quick bites, its eyes never leaving you. But
when it's done, it steps aside, allowing you passage across the drawbridge. You
have appeased the troll. For now.
Troll eats the fish. It tastes disgusting! It's raw! And definitely not sashimi-grade!
The player is happy.
go east

You are in the courtyard of ACTION CASTLE.
Exits:
West to Drawbridge
Up to Tower Stairs
Down to Dungeon Stairs
East to Great Feasting Hall


Characters:
 * A castle guard

You tread lightly across the drawbridge, the wood creaking ominously under your
weight. The drawbridge gives way to a courtyard, its cobblestones worn smooth
from years of use. The courtyard is eerily quiet, the only sound the distant
echo of laughter and music from the Great Feasting Hall to the east. To the
west, the drawbridge leads back towards the troll and the winding path. Stairs
lead up towards a tower and down towards a dungeon.

Standing guard in the courtyard is a castle guard. His armor is polished to a
shine, his spear gleaming in the moonlight. He watches you with a wary eye, his
hand never straying far from his weapon. But you're not afraid. You've faced
worse than this.
hit guard with branch
The player attacked guard with the branch.

With a swift, practiced motion, you swing the branch at the guard. The wood
connects with a sickening thud, the guard's helmet ringing like a bell. He
staggers back, dazed and disoriented. But he's not down. Not yet. He raises his
spear, his eyes filled with a mix of fear and determination. But you're ready.
You've faced worse than this.
The fragile weapon broke into pieces.
The player is happy.
Guard was knocked unconscious.
The player is happy.
Guard dropped the key in the Courtyard.
The player is happy.
Guard dropped the sword in the Courtyard.
The player is happy.
get key
The player got the key.

With a swift, practiced motion, you snatch up the key. The metal is cold
against your skin, the teeth sharp and precise. It's a key to a door, a key to a
mystery, a key to a challenge yet to be faced. But you're ready. You've faced
worse than this. With the key in your possession, you're one step closer to
unlocking the secrets of ACTION CASTLE.
go east

You stand inside the Great Feasting Hall.
Exits:
West to Courtyard
East to Throne Room

You see:
 * a strange candle
	read runes
	light candle

You tread lightly across the courtyard, the cobblestones cool under your boots.
The courtyard gives way to the Great Feasting Hall, its walls lined with
tapestries depicting scenes of valor and victory. The air is heavy with the
scent of roasted meat and spiced wine, a stark contrast to the violence that
lurks just outside the hall's doors. To the west, the courtyard and its fallen
guard. To the east, the Throne Room and the promise of power.

On a table in the center of the hall, a strange candle catches your eye. Its wax
is a deep, inky black, its wick untouched by flame. Runes are etched into the
wax, their meaning a mystery. But you're not afraid. You've faced worse than
this.
get candle
The player got the candle.

With a swift, practiced motion, you snatch up the candle. The wax is cool and
smooth against your skin, the wick untouched by flame. The runes etched into the
wax are a mystery, their meaning unknown. But you're not afraid. You've faced
worse than this. With the candle in your possession, you're one step closer to
unlocking the secrets of ACTION CASTLE.
go west

You are in the courtyard of ACTION CASTLE.
Exits:
West to Drawbridge
Up to Tower Stairs
Down to Dungeon Stairs
East to Great Feasting Hall

You see:
 * a short sword
Characters:
 * A castle guard

You tread lightly across the Great Feasting Hall, the scent of roasted meat and
spiced wine lingering in the air. The hall gives way to the courtyard, its
cobblestones worn smooth from years of use. The courtyard is eerily quiet, the
only sound the distant echo of laughter and music from the Great Feasting Hall
to the east. To the west, the drawbridge leads back towards the troll and the
winding path. Stairs lead up towards a tower and down towards a dungeon.

The castle guard lies unconscious on the ground, his armor dented and his spear
discarded. A short sword lies nearby, its blade gleaming in the moonlight. But
you're not afraid. You've faced worse than this.
go down

You are climbing the stairs down to the dungeon.
Exits:
Up to Courtyard
Down to Dungeon

With a swift, practiced motion, you descend the stairs. The air grows colder
with each step, the light from the courtyard fading until you're left in near
darkness. The stairs lead down, down into the depths of the dungeon. The only
way back is the way you came, back up to the courtyard. But you're not afraid.
You've faced worse than this.
light lamp
The player lights the lamp. It glows.

With a swift, practiced motion, you strike a match and light the lamp. The
flame flickers to life, casting long, dancing shadows on the dungeon walls. The
light is dim, but it's enough. Enough to see the damp stone walls, the rusty
iron bars, the forgotten prisoners who once called this place home. But you're
not afraid. You've faced worse than this. With the lamp lit, you're ready to
face whatever lurks in the depths of the dungeon.
go down

You are in the dungeon. There is a spooky ghost here.
Exits:
Up to Dungeon Stairs


Characters:
 * A ghost with bony, claw-like fingers and who is wearing a crown.

With the lamp in hand, you descend further into the dungeon. The air grows
colder, the silence more oppressive. The stairs give way to a large chamber,
its walls lined with rusty iron bars and chains. The only exit is the way you
came, back up the stairs.

In the center of the chamber, a ghost hovers. Its form is ethereal, its fingers
bony and claw-like. On its head, a crown glimmers in the lamplight. It watches
you with hollow eyes, its gaze filled with a mix of curiosity and malice. But
you're not afraid. You've faced worse than this.
light candle
The player lights the candle. It glows.

With a swift, practiced motion, you strike a match and light the candle. The
flame flickers to life, casting an eerie glow on the dungeon walls. The light
from the candle illuminates the ghost, its form flickering and wavering in the
flame's glow. The runes etched into the candle's wax begin to glow, their
meaning still a mystery. But you're not afraid. You've faced worse than this.
With the candle lit, you're ready to face whatever lurks in the depths of the
dungeon.
read runes
The player holds aloft the glowing candle cofered in strange runes. The odd runes are an exorcism ritual to dispel evil spirits.

With the candle in hand, you lean in to examine the runes. The symbols are
strange and unfamiliar, their meaning hidden in the depths of time. But as you
study them, a realization dawns on you. These are not just any runes. They're
an exorcism ritual, a spell to dispel evil spirits. A weapon, a tool to be
wielded with deadly precision. But you're not afraid. You've faced worse than
this. With the knowledge of the runes, you're ready to face whatever lurks in
the depths of the dungeon.
Ghost dropped the crown in the Dungeon.
The player is happy.
ghost is banished
The player is happy.
get crown
The player got the crown.

With a swift, practiced motion, you snatch up the crown. The metal is cold
against your skin, the jewels hard and unyielding. It's a symbol of power, a
symbol of authority, a symbol of the life you once knew. But you're not afraid.
You've faced worse than this. With the crown in your possession, you're one step
closer to claiming the throne of ACTION CASTLE.
go up

You are climbing the stairs down to the dungeon.
Exits:
Up to Courtyard
Down to Dungeon

With the crown in hand, you make your way back up the stairs. The air grows
warmer with each step, the light from the lamp casting long, dancing shadows on
the dungeon walls. The stairs lead up, up towards the courtyard and the promise
of power. The only way down is the way you came, back into the depths of the
dungeon. But you're not afraid. You've faced worse than this.
go up

You are in the courtyard of ACTION CASTLE.
Exits:
West to Drawbridge
Up to Tower Stairs
Down to Dungeon Stairs
East to Great Feasting Hall

You see:
 * a short sword
Characters:
 * A castle guard

With the crown in hand, you ascend the stairs. The air grows warmer with each
step, the light from the courtyard growing brighter. The stairs give way to the
courtyard, its cobblestones worn smooth from years of use. The courtyard is
eerily quiet, the only sound the distant echo of laughter and music from the
Great Feasting Hall to the east. To the west, the drawbridge leads back towards
the troll and the winding path. Stairs lead up towards a tower and down towards
a dungeon.

The castle guard lies unconscious on the ground, his armor dented and his spear
discarded. A short sword lies nearby, its blade gleaming in the moonlight. But
you're not afraid. You've faced worse than this.
go up

You are climbing the stairs to the tower. There is a locked door here.
Exits:
Down to Courtyard
Up to Tower

You see:
 * a door
	unlock door

With the crown in hand, you ascend the stairs. The air grows colder with each
step, the light from the courtyard fading until you're left in near darkness.
The stairs lead up, up towards the tower and the promise of power. The only way
down is the way you came, back down to the courtyard.

At the top of the stairs, a door stands. It's old and worn, its wood scarred
from years of use. A lock gleams in the faint light, its keyhole a dark void
waiting to be filled. But you're not afraid. You've faced worse than this.
unlock door
The player unlocked the door

With a swift, practiced motion, you insert the key into the lock. The metal is
cold against your skin, the key turning smoothly in the lock. There's a soft
click, and the door swings open. Beyond it, the tower awaits. But you're not
afraid. You've faced worse than this. With the door unlocked, you're one step
closer to claiming the throne of ACTION CASTLE.
go up

You are inside a tower.
Exits:
Down to Tower Stairs


Characters:
 * A princess who is beautiful and lonely. She awaits her non-gender-stereotypical soulmate.

With the crown in hand, you step through the door and into the tower. The air is
cool and crisp, filled with the scent of old stone and dust. The tower is
sparsely furnished, its walls lined with bookshelves filled with ancient tomes
and scrolls. The only exit is the way you came, back down the stairs.

In the center of the room, a princess sits. She's beautiful, her eyes filled
with a mix of hope and sadness. She's been waiting, waiting for someone to come
and break the monotony of her lonely existence. But you're not afraid. You've
faced worse than this.
give rose to the princess
The player gave the rose to Princess

With a swift, practiced motion, you reach into your inventory and pull out the
rose. The princess's eyes widen at the sight of it, her lips parting in a soft
gasp. You extend the rose to her, its petals a deep, velvety red and its scent
sweet and intoxicating. She takes it, her fingers brushing against yours in a
brief, electric touch. The rose is a symbol of love and passion, a symbol of
the life you once knew. And maybe, just maybe, a symbol of the life you could
have again.
Princess smells the rose. It smells subtly perfumed.
The player is happy.
Princess is happy.
The player is happy.
propose to the princess
Princess says YES!

With a swift, practiced motion, you drop to one knee and pull out the crown. The
princess's eyes widen at the sight of it, her hand flying to her mouth in
surprise. You extend the crown to her, its jewels glinting in the dim light.
It's
a symbol of power, a symbol of authority, a symbol of the life you once knew.
And maybe, just maybe, a symbol of the life you could have again.

"Will you be my queen?" you ask, your voice steady despite the pounding of your
heart.

The princess looks at you, her eyes filled with a mix of hope and fear. But
then, she smiles. A smile that lights up the room, a smile that promises a
future filled with love and happiness.

"Yes," she says. "Yes, I will."

And just like that, you're not alone anymore. You have a partner, a queen. And
together, you're ready to face whatever comes your way.
princess and The player are now married.
The player is happy.
wear crown
The player has been crowned as the monarch.  They may now take their rightful seat on the throne.

With a swift, practiced motion, you place the crown on your head. The metal is
cold against your skin, the jewels hard and unyielding. But it fits perfectly,
as if it was made just for you. As the crown settles on your head, you feel a
rush of power. It's a symbol of authority, a symbol of the life you once knew.
And now, it's a symbol of the life you've claimed for yourself. With the crown
on your head, you're ready to take your rightful place on the throne of ACTION
CASTLE.
down

You are climbing the stairs to the tower. There is a locked door here.
Exits:
Down to Courtyard
Up to Tower

You see:
 * a door
	unlock door

With the crown on your head, you descend the stairs. The air grows warmer with
each step, the light from the tower fading until you're left in the dim
courtyard. The stairs lead down, down towards the courtyard and the promise of
power. The only way up is the way you came, back up to the tower.

At the bottom of the stairs, a door stands. It's old and worn, its wood scarred
from years of use. A lock gleams in the faint light, its keyhole a dark void
waiting to be filled. But you're not afraid. You've faced worse than this.
down

You are in the courtyard of ACTION CASTLE.
Exits:
West to Drawbridge
Up to Tower Stairs
Down to Dungeon Stairs
East to Great Feasting Hall

You see:
 * a short sword
Characters:
 * A castle guard

With the crown on your head, you descend further into the courtyard. The air is
cool and crisp, filled with the scent of damp earth and blooming flowers. The
courtyard is eerily quiet, the only sound the distant echo of laughter and music
from the Great Feasting Hall to the east. To the west, the drawbridge leads
back towards the troll and the winding path. Stairs lead up towards a tower and
down towards a dungeon.

The castle guard lies unconscious on the ground, his armor dented and his spear
discarded. A short sword lies nearby, its blade gleaming in the moonlight. But
you're not afraid. You've faced worse than this.
east

You stand inside the Great Feasting Hall.
Exits:
West to Courtyard
East to Throne Room

With the crown on your head, you tread lightly across the courtyard. The
cobblestones are cool under your boots, the scent of roasted meat and spiced
wine filling the air. The courtyard gives way to the Great Feasting Hall, its
walls lined with tapestries depicting scenes of valor and victory. To the west,
the courtyard and its fallen guard. To the east, the Throne Room and the promise
of power. But you're not afraid. You've faced worse than this.
east

This is the throne room of ACTION CASTLE.
Exits:
West to Great Feasting Hall

You see:
 * An ornate golden throne.
	sit on throne

With the crown on your head, you tread lightly across the Great Feasting Hall.
The scent of roasted meat and spiced wine lingers in the air, a stark contrast
to the silence that greets you as you step into the Throne Room. The room is
large and grand, its walls lined with tapestries depicting scenes of valor and
victory. At the far end of the room, an ornate golden throne catches your eye.
It's a symbol of power, a symbol of authority, a symbol of the life you once
knew. And now, it's a symbol of the life you've claimed for yourself. But you're
not afraid. You've faced worse than this.
sit on throne
The Player now sits upon the throne. The reign of The Player has begun!

With a swift, practiced motion, you stride across the room and take your place
on the throne. The gold is cold against your skin, the cushion soft and
comfortable. As you settle into the throne, you feel a rush of power. It's a
feeling of authority, of control, of destiny fulfilled. You're no longer just a
player in this game. You're the ruler, the monarch, the one in charge. And as
you sit there, on the throne of ACTION CASTLE, you can't help but smile. Because
you've faced worse than this. And you've won.
The Player is now reigns in ACTION CASTLE! The Player has won the game!
The player is happy.
